sentences.en: Already the Snowblast's huge auger blades were engorging snow.
sentences.cn: 扬雪车上庞大的钻头叶片在开始大量吞进积雪.

sentences.en: Jason Hinson, a sixth-generation corn farmer near Kingston, Iowa, keeps an eye on his auger as he unloads his combine on the fly.
sentences.cn: 贾森·辛森，衣阿华州金士敦附近的第六代玉米农。 他一边把玉米从行进作业中的联合收割机上卸下来，一边观察着螺旋钻。

sentences.en: Neither of us knew how unstable and heavy that auger bit was.
sentences.cn: 我们两个都不知道钻孔机的钻头会那么不结实,又那么重.

sentences.en: Neither of us knew how unstable heavy that auger bit was.
sentences.cn: 两个都不知道钻孔机的钻头会不结实,又重.

sentences.en: Some fundamental aspects of Auger electron spectroscopy have been reviewed.
sentences.cn: 介绍了俄歇电子谱术的某些基本问题.

sentences.en: Study of Auger recombina - tion and h _ ( EF ) parameter.
sentences.cn: 俄歇复合和h_ ( EF ) 参量的研究.

sentences.en: The auger of the extruder adopts abrasion - resistance metal powder spray - painting technology.
sentences.cn: 螺旋挤出机的采用 耐磨 耐金属粉末喷漆技术.

sentences.en: The author discussed some key techniques in auger string hole straightening.
sentences.cn: 作者讨论了螺杆钻纠斜的几个关键技术问题.

sentences.en: The conclusion presents important references for design and selection of auger drills.
sentences.cn: 研究结果对螺旋钻具的设计和选用具有重要指导意义.

sentences.en: The earth auger is the important pilling machine under construction.
sentences.cn: 螺旋钻孔机是用于基建施工中一种重要的桩工机械.

sentences.en: The function of an auger is to bore holes.
The mechanism of photo Auger electrons and the secon dary electron yield is discussed.
sentences.cn: 分析了X射线 光电效应的特点,讨论了俄歇电子和二次电子的产生机制.

sentences.en: This coordination was confirmed by UV - visible spectra, X - rayphotoelectron spectroscopy ( XPS ) and Auger electron spectroscopy ( AES ).
sentences.cn: UV-vis 、 X—射线光电子能谱 ( XPS ) 和俄歇电子能谱 ( AES ) 证实了这种配位作用.

sentences.en: This method overcomes the problem of low metering accuracy of vertical auger.
sentences.cn: 克服了立式螺旋计量精度不高的难题,并配有夹袋装置和吸尘回收箱.

sentences.en: We make a hole in the ice with an auger.
sentences.cn: 我们用螺旋钻在冰上钻洞。
